requirements.question: Watch an anime with the genres “Action” and “Adventure”
Watch an anime with the genres “Action” and “Comedy”
Watch an “Action” anime with the tag “Shounen” or “Seinen”
Watch an “Action” anime with the tag “Shoujo” or “Josei”
Watch an “Action” anime with the genre “Romance” or the tag “Harem”
Watch an anime with the genres “Action” and “Fantasy”
Watch an anime with the genres “Action” and “Sci-Fi”
Watch an “Action” anime with the genre “Drama” or “Slice of Life”
Watch an “Action” anime with any of the genres or tags: “Sports”, “Mecha” or “Magic”
Watch an “Action” anime with any of the genres: “Mystery”, “Horror”, “Psychological” or “Thriller”
Watch an “Action” anime with any of the tags: “Ninja”, “Samurai”, “Martial Arts” or “Swordplay”
Watch an “Action” anime with the format “Special”
Watch another “Action” anime with the format “Special”
Watch an “Action” anime with the format “OVA” or “ONA”
Watch another “Action” anime with the format “OVA” or “ONA”
Watch an “Action” anime with the format “Movie”
Watch another “Action” anime with the format “Movie”
Watch an “Action” anime with the format “TV”
Watch an “Action” anime with the format “TV” or “TV Short”
Watch an “Action” anime with a mean score of 80% or above on AniList
Watch an “Action” anime with a mean score of 70% to 79% on AniList
Watch an “Action” anime with a mean score of 69% or below on AniList
Watch an “Action” anime with the source “Original”
Watch an “Action” anime with the source “Visual Novel”, “Video Game” or “Other”
Watch an “Action” anime with the source “Light Novel” or “Novel”
Watch an “Action” anime with the source “Manga”
Watch an “Action” anime that has a prequel or a sequel listed as a relation on AniList
Watch an “Action” anime from different studios: 1st studio
Watch an “Action” anime from different studios: 2nd studio
Watch an “Action” anime from different studios: 3rd studio
Watch an “Action” anime from different studios: 4th studio
Watch an “Action” anime from different studios: 5th studio
Watch an “Action” anime from different studios: 6th studio
Watch an “Action” anime that started airing in 1999 or earlier
Watch an “Action” anime that started airing between 2000 and 2004
Watch an “Action” anime that started airing between 2005 and 2009
Watch an “Action” anime that started airing between 2010 and 2014
Watch an “Action” anime that started airing between 2015 and the current year
Watch an “Action” anime with 12 episodes or less
Watch an “Action” anime with 13 episodes or more
Watch an “Action” anime with 24 episodes or more
Watch an “Action” anime with 30 episodes or more
Watch an “Action” anime that started airing in any Spring season
Watch an “Action” anime that started airing in any Summer season
Watch an “Action” anime that started airing in any Fall season
Watch an “Action” anime that started airing in any Winter season
Watch an “Action” anime with a title that begins with a letter between A–L
Watch an “Action” anime with a title that begins with a letter between M–Z
Watch an “Action” anime with a title that begins with the second letter of your username
Watch an “Action” anime with a non-alphanumeric character in the title
Watch an “Action” anime with a main character that uses a gun or sword
Watch an “Action” anime with a primarily female main cast
Watch an “Action” anime with a primarily male main cast
Watch an “Action” anime with a main character that is a villain or anti-hero
Watch an “Action” anime with a main character that has super powers or magical abilities
Watch an “Action” anime that takes place in a fantasy setting
Watch an “Action” anime with a main character that has blue or green eyes
Watch an “Action” anime from another participant’s challenge or an “Action” anime recommended by a user on the AWC Discord
Watch an “Action” anime you have not used for any other AWC Challenge
Watch an “Action” anime that was recently reviewed on AniList
